column1: '''''Sotheby's English Literature and History 19 July 1990''''' is an auction catalogue from [[Sotheby's]] (London). The description for lot 202 (p. 130) reproduces one page of, and quotes from a [[Letter to Miss Clark
column2: 1963 letter to a Miss Clark]].<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=66210 English Language and Literature. 1990] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 18 November 2011)</ref><ref>''Sotheby's English Literature and History 19 July 1990'', p. 130</ref>
